paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a BRCA2 variant including clinical significance and penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: There was also a BRCA2 nonsense mutation (p.K944*, c.1830A > T), which was present at a heterozygous allele frequency.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a nonsense mutation leading to a premature stop codon.

variants.additional_notes: The variant was identified in the context of a novel tumor fusion.
key_quotes: There was also a BRCA2 nonsense mutation (p.K944*, c.1830A > T), which was present at a heterozygous allele frequency.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward with clear information on the BRCA2 variant.
